name: Shifter Team
description:
Shifter Team is a  2D platformer where players must guide a team of two characters through a series of obstacles. The twist? Players can swap between the two characters at any time. Shifter Team is the perfect game for players looking for a fun and  platformer experience. Get ready to shift into high gear! 

Controls

1. Press Left shift to swap between the player and the bird 

2.A and D to move right and left
